Ingredients

Suitable for all skin types

Removes make-up & dirt

Deep cleanser

Alcohol-free

The natural, alcohol-free cleanser gently yet effectively cleanses the skin, getting rid of any make-up residues. A deep-cleansing gel that is free from any chemical substances that irritate the skin.

Apply to wet skin, massage to cleanse and rinse with water.
